Classes/FabItem.html#/s:3Fab0A4ItemC6act.name: action
Classes/FabItem.html#/s:3Fab0A4ItemC6act.abstract: The action the item should perform when tapped.

Classes/FabItem.html#/s:3Fab0A4ItemC14bu.name: buttonDiameter
Classes/FabItem.html#/s:3Fab0A4ItemC14bu.abstract: The item’s button diameter. Default diameter of 35.

Classes/FabItem.html#/s:3Fab0A4ItemC17la.name: labelButtonOffset
Classes/FabItem.html#/s:3Fab0A4ItemC17la.abstract: The distance between the item’s label and button.

Classes/FabItem.html#/s:3Fab0A4ItemC22di.name: dismissMenuOnSelection
Classes/FabItem.html#/s:3Fab0A4ItemC22di.abstract: Whether the menu is dismissed when this item is selected.

Classes/FabItem.html#/s:3Fab0A4ItemC20bu.name: buttonMouseOverScale
Classes/FabItem.html#/s:3Fab0A4ItemC20bu.abstract: The value to scale the button to when the cursor enters its bounds.

Classes/FabItem.html#/s:3Fab0A4ItemC10is.name: isDisabled
Classes/FabItem.html#/s:3Fab0A4ItemC10is.abstract: Whether the item ignores mouse down events.

Classes/FabItem.html#/s:3Fab0A4ItemC5lab.name: init(label:image:action:)
Classes/FabItem.html#/s:3Fab0A4ItemC5lab.abstract: Creates a new Fab item with an image and optional label.

Classes/FabItem.html#/s:3Fab0A4ItemC5lab.name: init(label:buttonIcon:action:)
Classes/FabItem.html#/s:3Fab0A4ItemC5lab.abstract: Creates a new Fab item with a label and button from an attributed string.

Classes/FabItem.html#/s:3Fab0A4ItemC5lab.name: init(label:action:)
Classes/FabItem.html#/s:3Fab0A4ItemC5lab.abstract: Creates a new Fab item with only a label.

Classes/FabItem.html#/s:3Fab0A4ItemC5lab.name: init(label:emoji:action:)
Classes/FabItem.html#/s:3Fab0A4ItemC5lab.abstract: A convenience initializer that creates a new Fab item with an emoji and optional label.

Classes/Fab.html#/s:3FabAAC6actionyyABcv.name: action
Classes/Fab.html#/s:3FabAAC6actionyyABcv.abstract: The action the button should perform when tapped.

Classes/Fab.html#/s:3FabAAC15firstItemOf.name: firstItemOffset
Classes/Fab.html#/s:3FabAAC15firstItemOf.abstract: The distance between the button and first item.

Classes/Fab.html#/s:3FabAAC14mouseOverSc.name: mouseOverScale
Classes/Fab.html#/s:3FabAAC14mouseOverSc.abstract: The value to scale the button to when the cursor enters its bounds.

Classes/Fab.html#/s:3FabAAC17mouseOverRo.name: mouseOverRotation
Classes/Fab.html#/s:3FabAAC17mouseOverRo.abstract: The angle, in radians, to rotate the button when moused-over and active.

Classes/Fab.html#/s:3FabAAC21hidesShadow.name: hidesShadowWhenActive
Classes/Fab.html#/s:3FabAAC21hidesShadow.abstract: Whether the button’s drop shadow should be hidden when active (expanded).

Classes/Fab.html#/s:3FabAAC26usesVisualE.name: usesVisualEffectBackground
Classes/Fab.html#/s:3FabAAC26usesVisualE.abstract: Whether to present the NSVisualEffectView when the button is active (expanded).

Classes/Fab.html#/s:3FabAAC13contentHeig.name: contentHeight
Classes/Fab.html#/s:3FabAAC13contentHeig.abstract: The height of the entire expanded content. Can be used to determine the minimum window size.

Classes/Fab.html#/s:3FabAAC6activeSbvp.name: active
Classes/Fab.html#/s:3FabAAC6activeSbvp.abstract: Indicates if the button is active (showing its items).

Classes/Fab.html#/s:3FabAAC11floatButton.name: floatButton
Classes/Fab.html#/s:3FabAAC11floatButton.abstract: The button that will be presented to the user.

Classes/Fab.html#/s:3FabAAC16visualEffec.name: visualEffectView
Classes/Fab.html#/s:3FabAAC16visualEffec.abstract: Blur effect that will be presented when the button is active.

Classes/Fab.html#/s:3FabAAC11isAnimating.name: isAnimating
Classes/Fab.html#/s:3FabAAC11isAnimating.abstract: Whether the Fab is animating to a different state.

Classes/Fab.html#/c:@M@Fab@objc(cs)Fab(i.name: toggleMenu()
Classes/Fab.html#/c:@M@Fab@objc(cs)Fab(i.abstract: Presents or hides all the Fab’s actions

Classes/Fab.html#/c:@M@Fab@objc(cs)Fab(i.name: dismiss()
Classes/Fab.html#/c:@M@Fab@objc(cs)Fab(i.abstract: Dismisses the Fab. Does nothing if the Fab is not presented.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
